#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        int checkA[10]={0};
        int checkB[10]={0};

        int numA , numB;
        cin>>numA>>numB;

        while(numA>0 && numB>0)
            {
                checkA[numA%10]++;
                checkB[numB%10]++;

                numA = numA/10;
                numB = numB/10;
            }

            int flag = 0;

            for(int i=0; i<=9; i++)
                if(checkA[i]!=checkB[i])
                    {
                        flag = -1;
                        break;
                    }

            if(flag==-1)
                cout<<0<<endl;
            else
                cout<<1<<endl;

    }
}
